parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Order the given unit(s) to stop (via the radio). <br>A stop command will never finish, the unit will never be ready.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''commandStop''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] or [[Array]] of [[Object]]s

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[commandStop]] _soldier1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[commandStop]] [_soldier1, _soldier2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[commandStop]] ([[units]] [[player]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[doStop]], [[stopped]], [[stop]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">
<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">In '''ArmA 1.14''', this command will not stop a unit that has been given a move order by means of selecting the unit, then clicking on the in game map (or ground).
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|COMMANDSTOP]]
